titles.title: A bill to direct the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to provide certain health-care services at the Vietnam Veterans Outreach Center in Marina, California.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 5/27/1987--Introduced. Directs the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to utilize the excess capacity at the Vietnam Veterans Outreach Center in Marina, California, to provide certain specified outpatient health care services to eligible veterans.
